name: BatteryElectrodeMetadata
description: A description of lithium ion battery electrode metadata

dimensions.name: n_coating_sides
dimensions.description: Number of sides of the electrode that are coated. Acceptable values are 1 or 2.

properties.name: active_material_mass_fraction
properties.description: Mass of the active material relative to the total mass of the coating

properties.name: binder_mass_fraction
properties.description: Mass of the binder relative to the total mass of the coating

properties.name: additive_mass_fraction
properties.description: Mass of the additive relative to the total mass of the coating

properties.name: planar_area
properties.description: Geometric planar area of the electrode

properties.name: coating_length
properties.description: Length of the electrode. For circular electrodes, the diameter

properties.name: coating_width
properties.description: Width of the electrode. For circular electrodes, the diameter

properties.name: shape
properties.description: Shape of the electrode. Valid entries are: rectangular, circular, other, or unkonwn

properties.name: coating_thickness
properties.description: Thickness of the electrode, as measured from the current collector surface to the top of the coating

properties.name: active_material_loading
properties.description: Mass of active material per unit area of electrode

properties.name: coating_porosity
properties.description: Nominal porosity (void volume fraction) for the electrode coating

properties.name: coating_tortuosity
properties.description: Nominal tortuosity for the electrode coating

properties.name: coating_bruggeman_coefficient
properties.description: Nominal tortuosity for the electrode coating

properties.name: coating_sides
properties.description: Number of sides that are coated. Valid entries are integers: 1 or 2
